title: Simultaneously improving the pore structure and electron conductive network of the anode catalyst layer via SnO2 doping for proton exchange membrane water electrolysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10390-10396
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00270A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bang Li, Guangfu Li, Qiqi Wan, Lei Yuan, Yingying Liu, Longxu Li, Xiaodong Zhuang, Junliang Zhang, Changchun Ke
The enhanced catalyst layer decreases isolated Ir atoms, improving the electronic network. It also increases contact area, reducing interface resistance, and enhances porosity to increase the specific surface area for catalytic reactions.
